message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its immense potential impact on your operations, I understand its true worth to be $1,500,000. However, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a premium discount. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
